Public Member Functions | Public Attributes

affx::TsvFileField Class Reference

TsvFileField holds the data read from a column. /// The data is read into a std::string buffer. /// Rather than resizing the buffer all the time, we try and /// fill it "in place". Most of the time the new value should be the same /// size as the old value. /// We store the clvl and cidx info in the Column as well. /// Saves having to search for it in the TsvFile object. /// / "cidx" is counted from *after* the leading tabs. ///. More...

#include <TsvFile.h>

Detailed Description

TsvFileField holds the data read from a column. /// The data is read into a std::string buffer. /// Rather than resizing the buffer all the time, we try and /// fill it "in place". Most of the time the new value should be the same /// size as the old value. /// We store the clvl and cidx info in the Column as well. /// Saves having to search for it in the TsvFile object. /// / "cidx" is counted from *after* the leading tabs. ///.
